## Median Age Map

```{r}
arizona_voters_age <- get_acs(
  geography = 'tract',
  variables = c( 
    median_age = 'B01002A_001'
  ),
  state = 'AZ',
  output = "wide",
  geometry = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
arizona_voters_age <- arizona_voters_age %>%
  select(-ends_with("M"))

colnames(arizona_voters_age) <- sub("E$", "", colnames(arizona_voters_age))
```

```{r}
mapview(arizona_voters_age, zcol = "median_age")
```
